UserRepository - Class in com.example.vortex_app.model
UserRepository handles all user-related data operations, including retrieving, saving, and updating user data in Firestore, as well as uploading and deleting avatar images in Firebase Storage.
UserRepository() - Constructor for class com.example.vortex_app.model.UserRepository
Constructor initializes the Firestore and Firebase Storage instances.

Callback interface for when an avatar image is deleted from Firebase Storage.

Callback interface for when an avatar image is uploaded to Firebase Storage.
UserRepository.OnUserLoadedCallback - Interface in com.example.vortex_app.model
Callback interface for when a user is loaded from Firestore.
UserRepository.OnUserSavedCallback - Interface in com.example.vortex_app.model
Callback interface for when a user is saved to Firestore.
